details.Zombie: Finished but parent hasn't read exit status

details.Result: Process has nowhere to write, crashes immediately
details.Lesson: NEVER close stdout/stderr of long-running processes!

details.why: No stdout = no way to report errors = crash

details.code:
log_file = open('/tmp/vite.log', 'w')
Popen(['npm', 'run', 'dev'], 
      stdout=log_file, 
      stderr=log_file,
      cwd='/workspaces/Aurora-x/client')
